#Getting and Cleaning Data Course Project#

The input files for the project are downloaded from 

https://d396qusza40orc.cloudfront.net/getdata%2Fprojectfiles%2FUCI%20HAR%20Dataset.zip

The files have to be dowloaded in the working directory before the script is run.

The scrpit is in run_analysis.R

The out put tidy data set is tidy_data.txt

===========================================================

The output consists of the following files

1. README.Rmd - this file 


2. Cookbook.Rmd  -  explians how the script and output is structured


3. run_analysis.R - the scipt used
